attributes.description: Overview of Kubernetes cluster metrics based on opentelemetry metrics collection

params.markdown: This dashboard is based on the elastic-agent-otel distribution and relies on metrics that are collected from kubeletstats and cluster_k8s receivers

panelsJSON.title: Average Node Memory Used vs Average Total Node Memory Available

embeddableConfig.description:
Top CPU Pods - Usage Limit: Are the most CPU intensive pods based on the cpu usage limit defined in the pods manifest. If one container of pod is missing the cpu limit configuration, then we fallback to node percentage calculation

Top CPU Pods - Node Percentage- Are the most CPU intensive Pods based on the Node CPU percentage utilisation

params.markdown:
**Top CPU Pods - Usage Limit**: Are the most CPU intensive pods based on the cpu usage limit defined in the pods manifest. If one container of pod is missing the cpu limit configuration, then we fallback to node percentage calculation

**Top CPU Pods - Node Percentage**: Are the most CPU intensive Pods based on the Node CPU percentage utilisation

embeddableConfig.description:
**Top Memory Pods - Usage Limit**: Are the most Memory intensive pods based on the memory usage limit defined in the pods manifest. If one container of pod is missing the memory limit configuration, then we fallback to node percentage calculation

**Top Memory Pods - Node Percentage**: Are the most Memory intensive Pods based on the Node Memory percentage utilisation

params.markdown:
**Top Memory Pods - Usage Limit**: Are the most Memory intensive pods based on the memory usage limit defined in the pods manifest. If one container of pod is missing the memory limit configuration, then we fallback to node percentage calculation

**Top Memory Pods - Node Percentage**: Are the most Memory intensive Pods based on the Node Memory percentage utilisation

attributes.title: [OTEL Kubernetes] Cluster Overview
